name: Son of Dionysus
description:
Hi All!

Welcome to Son of Dionysus.  You are a God sent from heaven with one mission; to turn the men of earth gay!

It's a NSFW Gay game built in Twine. Gameplay is with text and real porn images.

See more games or chat with with me on Discord at the Homotextual Gaming Guild: https://discord.gg/qYREzYE6
